backend/main.mo: Motoko backend managing user profiles and CRUD operations for user-owned projects with access-control checks.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to related frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Reference list summarizing all frontend source files and their roles.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables and light/dark mode styles.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component choosing LandingPage or CreatorDashboard based on Internet Identity authentication.
frontend/src/features/app-shell/CreatorD: Main creator dashboard layout with responsive sidebar, top bar, preview canvas, and context-sensitive control panels.
frontend/src/features/app-shell/SidebarN: Sidebar navigation component listing creator tool sections with icons and active-state styling.
frontend/src/features/app-shell/TopBar.t: Renders the top navigation bar with save/export buttons and a user menu supporting logout and profile display.
frontend/src/features/audio/AnalysisStat: Provides sliders to adjust audio analysis sensitivity and frequency band multipliers using the visualizer engine.
frontend/src/features/audio/AudioEditing: Displays trim and fade controls for the loaded audio file, allowing adjustments via sliders.
frontend/src/features/audio/AudioUploadP: Handles audio file upload and basic playback controls, showing file info and play/pause actions.
frontend/src/features/audio/useAudioEngi: Zustand store managing audio loading, playback, trimming, fades, and Web Audio API setup.
frontend/src/features/auth/AuthGate.tsx: Gates access to authenticated content, showing login UI or loading state as needed.
frontend/src/features/auth/ProfileSetupM: Modal prompting first‑time users to enter and save their display name before continuing.
frontend/src/features/background/Backgro: Placeholder panel for future background customization settings.
frontend/src/features/errors/ErrorBounda: Error boundary that displays a fallback UI with error details and a refresh button.
frontend/src/features/export/ExportPanel: Placeholder panel for future MP4 export controls.
frontend/src/features/overlays/OverlaysC: Placeholder panel for upcoming text and branding overlay controls.
frontend/src/features/preview/PreviewCan: Initializes and displays the visualizer canvas within a styled preview container.
frontend/src/features/projects/ProjectsP: Lists projects from the backend and provides a button to create new projects.
frontend/src/features/visualizer/modes/B: Renders a horizontal bar equalizer with 64 bars colored by frequency amplitude.
Renders a vertical bar equalizer centered horizontally with amplitude-based bar widths.
frontend/src/features/visualizer/modes/C: Draws a circular spectrum of radial bars representing audio frequencies.
frontend/src/features/visualizer/modes/M: Creates a soft glowing center pulse and minimal waveform based on average audio amplitude.
frontend/src/features/visualizer/modes/P: Generates reactive particles whose positions and sizes respond to audio frequencies.
frontend/src/features/visualizer/modes/R: Renders multiple neon rings with particle-like points modulated by audio data.
frontend/src/features/visualizer/modes/W: Plots a simple waveform line across the canvas showing raw audio amplitude.
frontend/src/features/visualizer/useVisu: Zustand-powered hook connecting React to the visualizer engine, syncing mode and audio analyzer state.
frontend/src/features/visualizer/Visuali: UI panel providing a select dropdown to choose visualizer modes using the visualizer engine store.
Canvas-based engine that renders audio visualizations by mode, applying sensitivity and frequency band multipliers.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user’s Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication via Dfinity AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks wrapping actor calls for user profiles and CRUD operations on projects.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variable definitions configuring colors, typography, and dark mode styles.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Utility function combining clsx and tailwind-merge to merge class names.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/CreatorDashboard.tsx: Creator dashboard page gated by authentication with profile setup and layout components.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Public landing page with hero section, features, and login button using Internet Identity.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters with sessionStorage fallback.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config extending theme tokens, colors, animations, and enabling plugins.
project_state.json: Metadata describing project goals, features, schema version, and image requirements.
